name: Wrath of the Ace Pilot
description:
You are the Ace Pilot, trying out the new prototype space ship!

  • Use arrow keys or WASD to move!
  • Shoot with space!
  • Collide with wrecked enemies to absorb then into your ship!

Try not to shoot any civilian buildings!

This was made for Ludum Dare 40, with the theme "The more you have, the worse it is"
